title: Good to see this here.
review: Though the city does not have much this kind of old hindu structure but it is symbolic of its culture of preserving these religious symbols.

title: A lovely Morning at this beautiful Temple
review: When we plan a trip to Agra, we plan to visit all the famous monuments, this temple is not considered but its a must have in our list. I visited the temple in the morning and there was quite a rush of people offering their prayers before they start their work. but still the mandir has a sense of peace and tranquility about it in that rush. a good way to start your day!!

title: management destroying the chrm of mandir
review: Any ancient monument specially Mandir's have their beauty in their ancientness. But now in the name of renovation they are destroying its beauty.

title: Jai Bhole Nath
review: This is a very Old Shiva Temple ,earlier it was on the out skirt of Agra but now it is in the crowded area ,Temple building is under renovation .

title: I am rating it average because they've made it average
review: A very beautiful Mandir has to loose its grace in the name of renovation. Renovation doesn't allow to even shatter the main walls of Garbh-greh. But Committee has done it successfully.

title: Beautiful temple!!!
review: The Rajeshwar Mandir was very beautiful. The Shiva is the Main god of this temple. The temple is very old and divine.

title: Rajeshwari temple
review: Rajeshwari temple is devoted to lord shiva..temple is very old and have their unique identity..temple is beautifull and view of surround look very awesome

title: Nice Temple !!
review: Rajeshwar Mandir is a great temple on the shamshabad road in Agra. This temple daily has many worshipers coming to the temple.

title: old temple dedicated to lord Shiva
review: It is a very beautiful and old temple. It is situated in Raja Kaira at Shamsabad Road in Agra.The temple has a beautiful Shivlinga installed inside the main sanctum along with a Nandi.Devotees take blessings from Lord Shiva by offering- Sugar, honey, Milk, flowers and the holy water of Ganges. Kanvarias also bring divine water to offer on Lingam during Shravana Maas.

title: 850 Year Old Temple
review: Rajeshwar Mahadev Temple is about 850 years old. It is said that the Shivalinga which is situated here is to be established in Rajkheda.this tample event mela in hindu calender savan month first Monday in every year spertual and worship palace in samshabad road agra

title: Place of God Shiva
review: This is very old temple,this temple also has sky scraper.

title: MY VISIT OF RAJESHWARA
review: This is a good temple for visit becouse all old mens say old is gold and this temple is very old.
